None.Name: Infused Intoxication
None.Description: Infuses a strong poison in the targeted enemy unit whose life points will be reduced by 40 per second. The poison will be refreshed every time the target deals at least 80 damage. Otherwise it may decay after just 5 seconds. Lasts for 30 seconds.
